myControl

Class ReservationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • myControl.ReservationManager

  • public class ReservationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Static control class for managing reservations within the application

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Method to initialised the arraylist. attempt to initialise array list from file. if fail create an instance of arraylist. This method must be called before the use of this static class

      • addReservation

        public static java.lang.String addReservation(java.lang.String guestID,
                                              java.lang.String roomID,
                                              java.lang.String strDate)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to add a reservation into the system.
        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of the guest
        roomID - String id of the room
        strDate - String representation of the date. Must be in YYYY MM DD HH format
        Returns:
        return Reservation details if successfully created
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception when guest id or room id is not found in system and guest has made a reservation or is already checked in. also throw exceptions when the date is not in the right format

      • editReservation

        public static java.lang.String editReservation(java.lang.String guestID,
                                               java.lang.String newRoomID)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to edit a reservation in the system. Only roomID is editable.
        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of guest
        newRoomID - String id of new room
        Returns:
        return edited Reservation details if successfully edited
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception when guest id is not found in system or when intended room is not available

      • cancelReservation

        public static java.lang.String cancelReservation(java.lang.String guestID)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to Cancel a reservation in the system. Does not delete the reservations object. only set its status to cancel. Reason for doing so is not to allow non sequential reservations id in system
        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of the guest
        Returns:
        return String representation of reservation. note that it is not deleted. only set to cancel
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception when guest id does not exist in system.

      • checkValidExpiry

        protected static boolean checkValidExpiry(java.lang.String resID)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to check the expired reservation in the system. Converts the incoming string object to a local date time object and see if the date is before current system time
        Parameters:
        resID - String id of reservation
        Returns:
        true if the date has not expired otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception when reservation id cannot be found in system

      • listAllReservations

        public static java.lang.String listAllReservations()
        Method to get a list of reservation in the system.
        Returns:
        String representation of all reservation in the system

      • getRoomFromGuestID

        public static java.lang.String getRoomFromGuestID(java.lang.String guestID)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to get the room ID base on the guest ID
        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of the guest
        Returns:
        roomID String room id of the guest if it has been reservated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception

      • saveReservations

        public static void saveReservations()
        Method for serialisation. write arraylist into file
